price: Dize: "Não sereis interrogados acerca dos crimes que cometemos, nem seremos interrogados acerca do que fazeis."
arabic: قُل لَّا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّآ أَجۡرَمۡنَا وَلَا نُسۡـَٔلُ عَمَّا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qul lā tus'alūna ʿammā ajramnā walā nus'alu ʿammā taʿmalūna
